entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump CDC issued a warning Jan 8.

Trump was acquitted Feb 5.

Trump held campaign rallies Jan 9, Jan 14, Jan 28, Jan 30, Feb 10, Feb 19, Feb 20, Feb 21, Feb 28.

He golfed on Jan 18, Jan 19, Feb 1, Feb 15, Mar 7, Mar 8.

First time he admitted coronavirus might be a problem: Mar 13.
